articles.author: Chris Scullion
articles.title: PS5 Slim size comparison image mock-ups have been created | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: The images give an idea of how much smaller the Slim model is…
articles.content:
A Reddit user has created mock-up size comparison images to show how much smaller the new ‘slim’ PlayStation 5 is.
Sony officially announced a new, smaller PS5 model on Tuesday, which will be availa… [+1500 chars]
